title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When conducting a search in external jar using Build 200201151, the search results are not being selected. This issue occurs specifically when searching for references to a certain field.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not being selected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 

1. Make sure JDK 1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Select the 'tmpFir' field.
4. Perform a search for references to this field using the provided search functionality.
